remarks: A normed module homomorphism is a left module homomorphism with bounded norm (a bounded linear operator).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)
statement:
isnmhm2.1 $e |- N = ( S normOp T ) $.
isnmhm2 $p |- ( ( S e. NrmMod /\ T e. NrmMod /\ F e. ( S LMHom T ) ) -> ( F e. ( S NMHom T ) <-> ( N ` F ) e. RR ) ) $.
